full_summary:
## Notice for Supply of Plumbers' Fixtures

### Mandatory Requirements

The Department of National Defence, under the authority of the Government of Canada, seeks to contract with a supplier for the supply of Strainers and Waste Drains, part of the plumbing fixtures.

### Description of the Requirements

The contracted supplier must deliver the following items to the specified locations:

* Item 1: 7 units of Strainers and Waste Drains (GSIN: 4510, NSN: 20-002-9159), to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.
* Item 2: 7 units of Strainers and Waste Drains (GSIN: 4510, NSN: 20-002-9159), to be delivered to CFB Halifax.

**Important Notes**

* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide the brand name, model, and/or part number, along with the National Codification Dealer's Activity (NCAGE) of the offered product.
* The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and Services (CFTA).
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Foreign currency bids will be disqualified.
* Documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The requirements will be evaluated based on the following:

* Canadianness: The preference for Canadian Goods and Services will be deeply considered in the evaluation process.
* Competent Pricing: Bidders must provide accurate and competitive prices.

### Contact Information

* Name: Jean-Pierre Normandin
* Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-3674

### Requested Documents

Please download the requested documents from the link [Contracting Process](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/23/d7d36f8e58ad3ab95c1b7f08033def8e/rfp_w8482-231347-a-en.pdf).
---

For more information, concerned bidders can send a message to Jean-Pierre Normandin at Jean-Pierre.Normandin@forces.gc.ca.

---

Contracted documents are available in both English and French; available for download on Canada's Bid Post website. Considered bidders should submit their proposal to the contracting authority by 2:00 PM (14:00) EST on May 2, 2023. All communication and queries related to this tender should be submitted to the contact number listed above.
